1.content: First of, you need to choose your race, so have at it!
1.title: Beginnings

11.content: Now you must choose a gender.
11.title: Gender

choices: You decide you're too nervous to go unless your best friend comes along.
111.content:
"What are you doing?"

"Packing. I'm going to Giddledale."

"Giddledale? How come you are going to Giddledale?"

"I have a penpal there, she's invited me, I'm staying for the festival of the Gnome Song."

"Wow! That's awesome! You can tell us all about it in Gnome Studies class! Sheesh, I envy you. Imagine being at the festival of the Gnome Song, actually! Seeing it LIVE! Wow. Double Wow."

"That's not all. I'm uh - uh - I'm participating in it. My penpal, Gwendolina Gnome, is one of the organisers. She said she's got special permission for a human to participate this year. They're - they're making - a - a - special stage for me and everything."

"You - YOU - YOU Neelandra Blockbuster, my best friend, age sixteen, are PARTICIPATING in the festival of the GNOME SONG and you didn't TELL me about it?"

"I couldn't. She had to get the permission and everything, and it had to be a secret till then. The Gnome Government is very strict about these things. I just got the call that it's all okay ten minutes ago, and I leave in half an hour. Listen, Sheela, I was going to call and tell you as soon as I'd finished packing, I promise. You just happened to come over before then."

"That's okay. This is sooooooo exciting. MY best friend is participating in the GNOME SONG festival! What are you going to sing?"

"Gwendolina's told me not to prepare anything. It seems gnomes never practise singing beforehand. They just get together the day of the concert, and the band passes thought waves to the singer, and the singer sings. I'm nervous, I've never sung live on stage before unless I know the song forward, backward and sideways!"

"You'll do okay. Sheesh. This is soooooo ..."

" ... exciting. It's not. It's nerve-wracking, from where I'm standing."
111.title: Gnome Song Participant

choices: ''My name is none of your business Drow!!''
112.content:
You have been captured by the drow for tresspassing on their land. Some sneer at you, others laugh and snicker at you. You are brought to the leader of the drow. ''Human. May i ask what is your name?''
You thought he was very polite..even though you were tresspassing doind who knows what..You reply.''My name..?''
112.title: Male

choices: Stay with Them and be Tested on
1122.content:
I raised my head to stare their leader in the eyes, his pale, charcoal like skin contrasting with his red eyes.

I gulped at the sight of him, and shakily spoke, "My name is Durandal, o-of Castleford." And as I said that, the watching Drows laughed, while they're leader smirked, scratching his long white hair.

"Where else would you be from human!" He chuckled, pushing himself off of his throne, and walked over to me, raising my chin to face him, while the Drow's holding down my arms grunted.

"Why were you trespassing on our land," he asked me, his cold breath hitting me, chilling me to the bone, It's not normal for a human, let alone a child to enter the West Side of Tyria. Speaking of that, how were you able to even make it to this part of Tyria? The Orcs or Dwarves would have captured you before you got here."

"I-I don't know," I gulped, adjusting my body, and then hung my head, "I apologize for my intrusion."

"You think we care about your apologies?" the leader forced my head to the ground, placing his foot on top of my head, restraining me.

"Take him to the dungeons," the leader chuckled, "And have someone inform Ragor of his presence. He'll be glad to finally have a live human test subject." I felt his foot lift itself off of my head, and I was forced to my feet by the guards, and it was then I realized my small advantage over them.

I was slightly taller than the Drows, all of them being around 3' to 4'5", while I was 5'5", a whole foot taller than them.

I could try to escape, but if I were to be caught, I could be put under harsher circumstances.

Though if I stay, I'll be tested on by them.

Or I could try holding one of them hostage, and try to escape that way.
1122.title: Durandal

12.content: Sorry, I could only fit five choices in that last chapter. So would you like to be an Elf or a Drow, and male or female?
12.title: Elf or Drow

121.content:
"I thought Father told you not to come out here anymore?"
You sigh, turning away from the view of the ocean below you. Kaylil, your brother, stands before you, arms crossed.
"I can't help it," you reply, "When I stay in the forest for too long I start to feel...trapped."
"Rowan," Kaylil says, putting his arm around you, "You're the strangest Elf I've ever met. The forest is our home, and yet you spend every waking moment out on a cliff staring at the sea."
"I like the sea," you say defiantly, "It doesn't judge me for being different. You know, I've been thinking."
"Well that can only lead to trouble," your brother laughs.
"Shut it," you reply, "I've been thinking about...you know...leaving."
Kaylil blinks, astonished.
"You can't leave!" he snaps, his cheerfulness replaced by sudden anger, "Father would never allow it!"
"I know," you say quietly, "That's why I'm not telling him, and you can't either."
"There's no talking you out of this?"
"No," you say, "There isn't."
"So...where exactly do you plan to go?"
121.title: The Journey Begins

choices: "Please? I would love for you to come along"
1212.content:
"You can't be serious," Kaylil says, shaking his head. "I can't imagine what you see in the gnomes."
"And what don't you see?" you say, "Why don't you come with me? Maybe you could learn a thing or two from the gnomes!"
Kaylil shakes his head, though he looks as if he could still be convinced.
1212.title: To Giddledale

choices: Mix of races, it would work better
122.content:
Your name, is faireal and as you grew up you were treated like a joke because of your "fairy-like name" but you were prepared to go the distance, another reason you couldn't stop them from making fun of you is your personality, unlike the drows you were actually kind hearted, although most are bad-hearted you found out that there was a problem in their system. Especially when you know they send out hunting parties, rid themselves of traitors, and burn anyone who wanders near the village if they have no reason to come here in the first place. But today was the day you sneak out of the village and leave, you were planning on either going and blending in with the elves, visiting the humans or going to a mixed race town, it would be hard to blend in with the shorter races or the orcs.
So far you knew that the hunting parties came back when they have been gone for 5 hours, they were the town's best defense, not only defense obviously but as a race with a huge target on its back we were feared and rightly so. According to what you know so far you hide your presence with magic and jump on up a tree, your parents wouldn't say a thing about it because they always pretended that someone else was having fun raising me, you learned about this world Tyria when your aunt was executed and then a week later your only cousin for treason.
It would take at least a week for them to notice you missing because you kept yourself alone to collect your thoughts all the time. This is how you comitted treason and this is the story of you Faireal
122.title: A reason for treason

choices: Suddenly we recieve an urgent summons
They help me adjust to the day.
1223.content:
Currently I was waiting, waiting for the hunting party to pass me by, 'So I can head to the settlement, they had a huge security and although they would let me in, most likely they would follow me until I break the law.' Being fine with that I finally smirk to myself, the time draws cloaser and here comes the hunting party. But one of them stopped by the tree I was on, I slip behind it, I was always the best hider after all and the drow looked back. The one who looked back was a drow who always seemed to ignore me but it was very obvious, I am sure everyone knew he judged me the most, you could see it in his face after all.
Leaping off the tree I looked at the sun and saw it was early morning, just making sure this would work, I would arrive sometime early afternoon. I reach down and grab a special herb growing and using a knife I brought I cut it open. You are probably now wondering what I brought, I brought bread, a small knife for necessity, a pouch filled with special magic, and a book filled with various spells, a bow would be nice but I was trying to bring less things, I don't want to seem hostile at all. Then I use the plant and fold it's leaves over before washing it in water, then I grind it with a normal stone and it turns into a creamy color, I gather a quantity as large as I can before covering all my skin with it using a magic to manipulate it to cover my skin with the least amount, the only way for it to come off is if I release my magic, or if someone hits me with lightning magic. Although it was easy to hide if I am using my magic since it is on my skin I could blend it like someone would blend their magic presence.
I forgot, I am Faireal but my age is that of an 8 year old, the earlier I leave, the easier it will be for the other villages to accept me and not try to cause me trouble. I use my excess speed to dash forward as I sense for anything within a radius of 1(you can decide mile or kilometer). I soon come across a cart being attacked by some weird bird like monster, but the cart was being protected by mercenaries of some kind, I think some people called them adventurers or explorers or something? It looks like they can't defeat it very well and its call soon makes room for its family to come, three kids and a bigger bird arrive, they were having trouble on the mom, how can they beat a family of that monster? I run forward pulling out the book I brought and flipping through the pages, I forgot how to perform the grounding spell because I didn't need to. I find it thanks to the person who organized this book and use the mana flow to complete the sequence before I cause all of the birds to hit the ground rendering their wings useless by spell, they had trouble moving around, its not like I added gravity, no I connected them to the ground, it was a spell created to increase the effect of a wall built to keep people out.
I begin to keep heading for the village but the cart driver yells for me to wait as the mercenaries finish the bird monsters. Though I probably shouldn't call them mercenaries, "Thank you little miss but is it okay for a little one like you to wander around here even if you are strong? I see you heading to the same place as us so do you want to come?" The man says as I put away my book and stare at him woth doubt and confusion. I nod and he continues, "Great, now before we head off are you an adventurer?" I shake my head no, it was kind of that way because I was from Dal Armos Valley from the west but I try not to tell them that. At one point they ask if I have money for the tax to get in but when I shake my head no they look at each other and each hand me a small coin, I don't know the currency so I just accepted it and went along woth them. Later on we reached the town and made a smooth transition inside the town, it was crowded, this was the so-called "melting pot" of the races except drows who're known as evil.
I see other races like Beastfolk:beastfolk are a peaceful race, they will only be hostile if you pose a threat to their people like the humans did hundreds of years ago but they sorta made amens since then. They have great physical strength and magic, their abilities are great but you won't see them making the greatest weapons or inventing anything beyond common day stuff. The reason I am made fun of back at my old home Fairies: fairies are invisible and undetectable unless you are a good-hearted human, an elf, a drow, or a beastfolk, but most drows ignore them. They can't really lie and are very kind, the reason Drows ignore them is because they can't really help with physical labor and Drow has excellance in magic, Fairies also are more trouble to catch then to do anything with so they are just there. There are many races but I will just leave them for when they might become an important role I heard that an orc runs this town but I don't know more than that. I ask the cart driver what he thinks and he says that although it is sort of dangerous job, I would be able to be an adventurer because of my strength. I nod because he is older and the mercenaries allow me to follow them to the adventurer place whatnot, upon entering I see many people like the adventurers, the adventurers almost all in armor or at least equipped with something good. I go up to what looks like reception and ask for an adventurer card.
They agree and show a blank card, I do as they instruct and place my hand on it and it fills out stuff like my name and age, then they ask me to use my blood to find out my optimal class, I do so and they mark things down before they give the card back to me. Then they call people down to me and I see a group of adventurers, a male and female human who were holding hands like they were friends, the female was some sort of mage and the guy was holding a really big shield which is why they stood out so much, he had a really big sword at his waist and he looked left-handed like I was. There was a male elf who seemed to be covered in many weapons all small or thin so he was probably quick fighter, he probably had magic too. There was a fairy flying in the middle of the group above their heads and the fairy was green with green clothing to match the glow. Seemed to wield a bow and wand so she was probably really skilled. Finally there was two female beastfolk, they looked similiar as one was a cat beastfolk and the other some sort of dog, probably a husky by the looks of it. The cat had two very thin swords, a staff for physical abilities but it had magical augmentation to be used for magic too, and she had a whip. The wolf-looking beastfolk also had twin swords but also had a big heavy sword, twin daggers, and gloves and the daggers had augmentation as well. This was a really skilled team, probably overly so.
"We have brought you a team to work with since you are so young, we don't want you to die off at such a young age so we have prepared this team for you and we hope you adjust to them well, these two"she points to the human couple the male first, "is Drew and Lila, the elf here is ghetsk, and the fairy is drola(yes, fairy named after drow and drow named after fairy, perfect idea) the beastfolk are cait(cat beastfolk) and wendy(wolf beastfolk), this here is Faireal and she is joining your group for now, take good care of her," I don't know why but she turned her head away from me and handed them a small letter when talking. She then turns to me and pats my head treating me like a child but I was fine with it because she mean't well and not many people would want to do that anyway. Then the team takes me to the a house they bought, it was like their base of operations and I had never seen these before so my mind was blown.
"You will stay here while you are on this team and I hope you enjoy it Faireal." Lila says to me, I nod happily and walk around in curiosity. What I didn't know was they knew I was a drow and they had a really high skilled team watch me to make sure I didn't do any evil deeds, the letter said so, they read it and burned it. My new life was only beginning
1223.title: Mix of races, it would work better

choices: Team talks about Faireal the drow
Faireal gets adjusted for tomorrow's mission
12232.content:
They showed me the bed I would have it was nice and they told me whose whose room is, then as the humans Lila and drew were showing me around the rooms I heard the house break apart, it didn't actually but it sounded like it, I ran downstairs to see Cait and Wendy sitting down on two chairs set up but there wasn't the table I saw earlier when I came in, all I saw was a hole the size of the table where they were sitting, Cait and Wendy had a panicked face and Drew quickly turns to me and says, "I am sure they didn't mean it, they were just having an arm wrestle like usual, how about we go to town and look for some weapons or armor for you?" I nod silently, I had a hard time talking due to my upbringing but they probably thought I was giving them the silent treatment or something or that I knew something they didn't.
When the door closed I coulda sworn I heard whispers of "Do we really have to work with this dark creature?" They probably thought I couldn't hear whispers past a sound isolated house but I was better physically compared to other drows or elves. I shut it out of my mind as I was kind of confused about it and Lila separates from her boyfriend to help me with these things while Drew searches around for something else probably a gift for Lila.
"So do you want to have a mock battle so I can find your fighting preference?" I try to shake my head no but Lila is already dragging me to a wide open space despite what I would say and she moves to the other side, "I'll let you make the first move then." I look down before looking back up to fight, fighting is not my favorite thing to do but that is alright then, I run forward and cast three magic at the same time, another reason people payed no attention to me was because I was a prodigy very skilled and they wanted to make me grow faster, they even named me after fairies. I first use a speed enhancement, then I cast a dizzy status-causing technique which has no effect but before the dizzy takes effect I cast the third, lightning-attributed dome to trap the opponent by wrapping around them.
The dizzy spell fails because of a forcefield and the lightning just surrounds the dome stopping before Lila looks surprised in more ways then one. Then she releases the dome and jumps over the lightning binds before castinga powerful water cannon spell causing a huge torrent of seemingly endless water to course through the air to me, "You have to fight your opponent not distract them, and defend to even if you are good at your magic you need certain magic for it to work!" I shake at that and fall over in fear as I look above me and where I once stood water gushes through, if I got hit the force enough could more than easily kill me. I roll over and cast the lightning bind twice but before I make the spell move I cast a lightning bolt and throw it forward, its power was not that powerful but it causes damage over time by continuosly overcharging it.
She smiles and the forcefield she recreates is destroyed by the lightning bolt and then I throw both of the two spells I held back and it wraps around her but before it restricted her she throws her staff to me and the staff is wrapped with my own lightning!!! I get hit on the side of the face and roll along the ground a few times. When I get up my right cheek is uncovered from the special cream and I look scared, Lila looks at me sad, I sneak my right hand into my pouch and cover it in cream, "Are you a drow?" She whispers to me looking shocked but the entire team is bad liars they knew I was a drow.
"Nonono, this is dirt..."I rub my face with the cream and use magic to electrocute my right hand which cleaned it to make it look like dirt, to make my own skin look like dirt, I was truly sad and Lila probably could see the sadness in my eyes. I then clap my hands together completely hiding my skin and use Earth magic to make it look like dirt fell from my hand.
She sighs and smiles, "Phew, I was worried for a second there, now lets get you a weapon you look like you could be great with weapons if you tried it but you probably have no weapons so it might be hard, there is no worries on that matter." Then she sees me raise my hand politely but I look awkward like I have never been polite before.
"What if I try all the weapons, I could tell you if a weapon doesn't suit me if the situation occurs." Lila was surprised and smiles because I was talking more, she was able to discover how bad of a liar I was and she liked my suggestion, luckily the shop clerk saw it was for me and decided to give me a beginners discount. We ended up discarding the basic sword design because it had no special traits like many other weapons and we discarded the axe because I kept launching the end when swinging because I would either drop it because the odd heavy end weakening the grip of the blade itself. But we kept the thin sword and big sword designs, we also agreed that a small hatchet would be worth keeping too because it was more usable. Lila proposed that I could be a more all around adventurer but over all I had trouble using my strength in a full attack, I would always miss, hold back, or divert the damge so I could never fully inflict a full attack on anything, not even a punching bag or target. Lila smiles to this and when Drew returns she mouths words to him out of my view so I couldn't tell what she was saying(mouthing).
After Drew runs ahead Lila faces me, "Now lets go surprise them!" We walk towards the base slowly and it seems like it is calmer and more serene than before, and it looked much more pretty. Drola welcomed me in and everyone was smiling except Drola and Ghetsk, Ghetsk could probably tell I was a drow because he is an elf and all of that but why was Drola so serious looking, she was probably one of the most serious out of them all.
"So how did it turn out?"Drola asks her seriousand strict voice showing.
"This new member is very strong, she even has talent with many of the weapons, most of the weapons, nearly all!" I smile lightly and I don't see Lila make a triple wink. Ghetsk looks surprised but it was probably from the triple wink that I didn't see, I assumed it was actually from my talent so I make a light bow to show respect since he is an elf and a senior one at that, at least compared to me he seems like it.
Drola the fairy makes a tensed up sigh and smiles slightly but the strict atmosphere didn't go away, "Ok, then we will try a mission, I think it would be better if we did it at night-"everyone begins to groan but the fairy releases a shockwave which knocks everyone to the ground she targeted except me, Ghetsk, and Drew because we didn't groan, and drew was tough enough for it with his high defense. "I hope you can assist us in this mission too little miss Faireal." She makes a smile and it was obvious she was talking to a kid before her face goes plain and she flies back on up in the air.
(What Faireal doesn't know is that Lila judged her as trustworthy enough and that everyone knows Lila is special in that she is very skilled at reading emotions but they will act somewhat the same until later when they know more of Faireal and they become really close, this is how the story of an outcast becomes more than just a hero. How someone who can't fit in, finds a way to fit everywhere bringing entire races together and starting new adventuers.)
A single male drow was searching around and did not find that little outcast drow, the drow only remembers the name was fairy or for real or something. It didn't matter as he remembered her face, he flashbacks to the time when leader told him to go train her, she was strong and she was continuosly challenged over and over so she could be raised up to crush the other races, she was born and tested on and she was compatible, she is the most compatible in centuries for the execution of others and to create extinction throughout the continent, no the world! She was a weapon in it of itself and she could wipe out the planet if she was trained well enough, she could do it whenever she wanted and no other drow could train her except him. The flashback ends and he smiles, he would be the one to wield the most powerful weapon in the world and he could raise it like he wants all because he became strong, he took a journey from the weakest to the strongest and now he can control something more powerful then the world, his life was hard but it was all worth it, the drow "soul" raised by the monsters of the West would conquer the world. Now all he had was the scent of her mana, he had a special ability to trace mana as long as they use it, although he would travel less than half the speed so it would take 4 or 5 days he would retrieve the girl whether he wanted to or not, he gets on a horse and sets off as soon as he stocks up, he had no time to waste.
12232.title: Hiding and finding

14.content: Now you need to choose your gender
14.title: Gender

15.content: So, are you male or female?
15.title: Gender

info.brief_description: This is YOUR story, set in the fantasy world of Tyria. You can do anything you want.
info.description:
The land of Tyria is a metling pot of races, landscapes, and cultures. Here is a list of the races and where they reside:

Humans: Resourceful, capable. Range from evil to good. They are spread across Tyria, but most typically stay up north, in the city of Castleford.

Elves: Clever, quick witted. Most are of good alignment, although there are exceptions. They reside mostly in Rosewood Forest, near the southern coast of Tyria. (There have always been racial disputes between Humans and Elves

Drow: Dark skinned cousins of the Elves. Most of them have turned to evil. They are found in the Dal Armos Valley, on the western side of Tyria.

Dwarves: Productive and battle loving. They range from good to evil, but most have a great repect for laws. They reside in the Yaisarg Mines, just south of Castleford.

Gnomes: Intelligent and inventive. They are almost always of good alignment. They make their home in Giddledale, northeast of Rosewood Forest.

Orcs: Strong and tough. Contrary to popular belief, most Orcs are very noble. They live in the Fyre Hills, near the center of Tyria.
